description: Try our easy to follow Beef, Lentil & Tomato Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Beef, Lentil & Tomato Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk remaining oil, vinegar, garlic, mustard and honey together in a jug. Set aside. Combine lentils, tomato, onion and half of the dressing in a serving bowl. Thinly slice steak and add to salad with rocket. Add feta and capers and serve with remaining dressing.
